speaker: Lamplord
dialogue: What’s wit the long face loser? Didja finally get dumped?

speaker: Agent
dialogue: Hello Leonard, it’s funny you mention getting dumped, as it seems that Sheila’s apartment has been wrecked and she’s nowhere to be found. You wouldn’t have something to do with that would you?

speaker: Lamplord
dialogue: Ah! You got me there detective. I had gone into the apartment but only because I have yet to receive the rent payment from that partner of yours. But if I had to guess...I know the Mothfia had their eye on her so go bother them.

speaker: Agent
dialogue: They have eyes and ears all over this neighborhood so they might have the information I need to find out what’s happened to Sheila.
